name: Bazarium
description:
Description:

Bazarium is a point-and-click, hand drawn puzzle game. You will have to find missplaced objects in 3D paintings and bring them back to where they belong. As you reconstruct the paintings so will their music and audio ambiance.

Made in 48 hours during Global Game Jam 2021.

Controls:

  • Camera: Arrow Keys or Mouse
  • Painting Interactions: Left Click
  • Painting Transitions: 1 - 5 keys or Click on Sketchbook Menu

Team:

  • Elio "Nexsolotl" de Gani : Game Dev / Game Design
  • Nathanaelle "Aetumn" Ullmo :  Game Dev / Game Design
  • Léa Haouzi : Art Direction / Assets and Backgrounds
  • Thomas Eïd : Art Direction / OST / Sound design
